headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Podium Vehicle: Bravado Gauntlet Classic and More
content:
Swing by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort and give the Lucky Wheel a spin for the opportunity to score GTA$, RP, clothing and more. This week's grand prize is the brash and bold Bravado Gauntlet Classic.

Plus, the Casino Store has a rotating selection of clothing, accessories and artwork. Some might call an Adorned Hoodie or Ornate High Roller Jacket a tad gaudy, but what do they know? You're the one posing next to your newest Bertolt sculpture on Snapmatic for all your friends to see.
